channel.title: FFmpeg on Vc
channel.description: Recent content in FFmpeg on Vc

item.title: Ubuntu20 install FFmpeg
item.description: Start Download FFmpeg Install tool 1. install yasm sudo apt-get install yasm if not installed yasm, os will output “nasm/yasm not found or too old. Use –disable-x86asm for a crippled build.” 2. install SDL2 SDL2-2.0.12(stable) tar -xvf SDL2-2.0.12.tar.gz cd SDL2-2.0.12 ./configure sudo make -j4 sudo make install Install FFmpeg 1. git clone https://git.ffmpeg.org/ffmpeg.git ffmpeg cd ffmpeg/ ./configure sudo make -j4 sudo make install 3. Check ffmpeg -version ffplay -version
